item.title: A command frame
item.dc:creator: @jonne77 jonne77
item.description:
@jonne77 wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:2, topic:115147”]try adding something like this

if(command.startsWith("commands")) { sendQuest("@dre@Command Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("", 8145); sendQuest("", 8147); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }[/quote]

THANKS!

item.title: A command frame
item.dc:creator: @Shift Shift
item.description:
@Shift wrote:

public void CommandList(){
//put all of your frames in here
}

Then in your commands put this:

if(command.startsWith("commands")){
CommandList();
}

Read full topic
